name: precision-editor-js
description: A simplified MCP server for making targeted edits to code without rewriting entire files
author: DaVinciHack

mcp.name: Precision Code Editor
mcp.description: Make targeted edits to files without rewriting entire code

tools.name: readFile
tools.description: Read a file with path validation

filePath.description: Path to the file to read

tools.name: writeFile
tools.description: Write content to a file with automatic backup

filePath.description: Path to the file to write

content.description: Content to write to the file

createBackupFile.description: Whether to create a backup of the file before writing

tools.name: editCode
tools.description: Make targeted edits to specific sections of code

filePath.description: Path to the file to edit

createBackupFile.description: Whether to create a backup of the file before editing

formatCode.description: Whether to format the code after editing

tools.name: status
tools.description: Get the status of the Precision Code Editor
